title: 14 days banned account
body: Hello my account has been suspended for 14 days due to abuse of other players. Please have my account repaired as I will no longer be allowed to offend. I am sorry because while playing other players, I am insulting and spoiling the games.Му account GambleElite.Please Riot help me.

replies.body: I'm not exactly sure what happened, but if you ended up with a 14-day suspension for chat behavior it might be best to hit up the player behavior agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

My 14 day ban got reduced to a 10 game chat restriction. I think that if you don't have recent history of bad behavior then that's the golden ticket to getting a reduced sentence. Keep that in mind when you put forth your ticket fellow summoner. :)

It sounds like you got punished for your behavior, and are agreeing that you created a negative experience for others. Your ban most likely won't be shortened or removed, you must wait until the ban is over. When your ban is finished, I would highly suggest following through with your words, because the next punishment will be a permanent one. And behavioral bans are very rarely lifted, especially when they are justified.
